entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Ear Falls

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
